featured.text: What are the characteristics of Jeanie’s Kiddie Stool? (A) Permanent and foldable.
The major chemical characteristics of seawater.
The characteristics of the activities Dognition offers.
Three main varieties of tea—Chinese, Assamese, and Cambodian—have distinct characteristics.

definition.en_def: A distinguishing quality or feature of a person, thing, or group.
definition.example: Her kindness is one of her most admirable characteristics.
